metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9377 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in the nbns_spoof function in plug-ins/nbns_spoof/nbns_spoof.c in Ettercap 0.8.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly execute arbitrary code via a large netbios packet.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9377` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ettercap-common - 1:0.8.1-3
ettercap-graphical - 1:0.8.1-3
ettercap-text-only - 1:0.8.1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ettercap package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.8.1-3').
